pulltitle: Use heka for log aggregation on the dev server.
pullsbody:
This configures the server at scrypt.dev.lcip.org to send its nginx and application logs over to:

```
http://logs.dev.lcip.org
```

Makes for nice easy viewing.  @jbonacci @SamPenrose r?
pull_repo_desc: Small web service for running the Scrypt KDF
pull_commit_message: Use heka for log aggregation on the dev server.

pulltitle: Configure loadtests to run against, and in, AWS deployment cluster.

pullsbody:
I've tried the API endpoint via JavaScript and CURL. However it has issues with the request body. 
This fix should solve these problems and I have it working locally. 
(If this is true, @rfk might need to redeploy this?)

Reference:
http://docs.pylonsproject.org/projects/pyramid/en/1.3-branch/narr/webob.html#dealing-with-a-json-encoded-request-body

Let me know!
pull_repo_desc: Small web service for running the Scrypt KDF
pull_commit_message: Fixing JSON request

pullsbody:
(This PR is against the "sometests" branch, because I did a bit of file-moving and didn't want to create merge problems)

Adding a basic awsboxen deployment and docs on how to run it.  This spins up a loadbalancer and fixed-size autoscale group of worker instances.  It's currently running live at http://scrypt.dev.lcip.org/

/cc @zaach for testing against the live server

@SamPenrose r?
pull_repo_desc: Small web service for running the Scrypt KDF
pull_commit_message: hello world unit test of validate_parameters
